name: Rose Paladin
effectText: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the GY: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 Plant monster from your hand or Deck in Defense Position. You can send this card from your hand to the GY; add 1 Level 7 or higher Plant monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Rose Paladin" once per turn.
